k8sNetwork.description: The network-related settings for the cluster.

pods.description: The network settings for Kubernetes pods.

cidrBlocks.description: Specifies a range of IP addresses to use for Kubernetes pods.

services.description: The network settings for Kubernetes services

cidrBlocks.description: The range of IP addresses to use for Kubernetes services

kind.description: The kind of the Kubernetes cluster.

orgName.description: The name of the Organization in which cluster needs to be created or managed.

virtualDataCenterName.description: The name of the Organization data center in which the cluster need to be created or managed.

site.description: Fully Qualified Domain Name of the VCD site in which the cluster is deployed

phase.description: The phase describing the control plane infrastructure deployment.

sizingPolicy.description: name of the sizing policy used by the node pool

placementPolicy.description: name of the sizing policy used by the node pool

diskSizeMb.description: disk size of the VMs in the node pool in MB

nvidiaGpuEnabled.description: boolean indicating if the node pools have nvidia GPU enabled

storageProfile.description: storage profile used by the node pool

desiredReplicas.description: desired replica count of the nodes in the node pool

availableReplicas.description: number of available replicas in the node pool

upgrade.description: determines the state of upgrade. If no upgrade is issued, only the existing version is stored.

kubernetesVersion.description: current kubernetes version of the cluster. If being upgraded, will represent target kubernetes version of the cluster.

tkgVersion.description: current TKG version of the cluster. If being upgraded, will represent the tarkget TKG version of the cluster.

kubernetesVersion.description: the kubernetes version from which the cluster was upgraded from. If cluster upgrade is still in progress, the field will represent the source kubernetes version from which the cluster is being upgraded.

tkgVersion.description: the TKG version from which the cluster was upgraded from. If cluster upgrade is still in progress, the field will represent the source TKG versoin from which the cluster is being upgraded.

ready.description: boolean indicating the status of the cluster upgrade.

private.description: Placeholder for the properties invisible to non-admin users.

kubeConfig.description: Admin kube config to access the Kubernetes cluster.

createdByVersion.description: CAPVCD version used to create the cluster

apiVersion.description: The version of the payload format
